dc_title_s: America siue India Nova ad magnae Gerardi Mercatoris aut Vniversalis imitationem in compendium redacta
dc_description_s: 1 map: color; (In Mercator (Gerhard). Atlas. Ed. 10° (11th ed.) fol. Amsterodami, sumptibus H. Hondij, 1630); Insets: Golfo Mexi Cano; Haiti nunc Hispaniola; Cuba, and Title. Decorative border; Print version has date 1595 pencilled in title inset. Scale approximately 1:60,720,000 (W 180°--W 0°/N 90°--S 90°).
